title: Spinach salad with dolcelatte

For the salad: 1 roasted red pepper from a jar, drained and sliced

steps: Place the vinegar and olive oil together in a bowl and whisk together.
Pour the dressing over the spinach leaves and red pepper and mix together to coat well.
To serve, place the salad into a clean bowl and sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Crumble the dolcelatte over the top and serve.
